descriptions: Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage, the ultimate gaming and office chair designed for comfort and style. Made with premium soft PU leather and hand-sewn diamond cross stitching, this chair offers a luxurious look and feel. The built-in USB powered lumbar pillow provides a soothing massage function, while the chair back reclines from 90° to 155° for maximum relaxation. With smooth 360° swivel and adjustable armrests coated in soft PU leather, this chair offers the perfect combination of comfort and functionality. The integrated metal frame and 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover wheelbase ensure stability and durability, while the thickened explosion-proof chassis and tilt mechanism control provide added safety. With a weight capacity of 330lb and a one-month free return policy, you can trust in the quality and reliability of this chair. Plus, with 5 years of free replacement for chair parts, you can enjoy peace of mind knowing your investment is protected. Whether you're gaming or working, the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage is the perfect choice for anyone who values comfort and support.

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair in stunning Purple! This premium chair is crafted with the highest quality soft PU leather and features hand-sewn diamond cross stitching for a luxurious look and feel. The USB-powered lumbar pillow provides a soothing massage function, perfect for long gaming or work sessions. With a chair back that reclines from 90° to 155°, 360° swivel, and adjustable armrests coated in soft PU leather, this chair offers the ultimate in comfort and flexibility.

The integrated metal frame and 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover wheelbase have undergone rigorous 2000-mile rolling tests for durability and stability. The thickened explosion-proof chassis and SGS and BIFMA certificated gas cylinder ensure safety and reliability. With a maximum weight capacity of 330lb and a one-month free return policy, you can trust in the quality and comfort of this chair. Plus, with a 5-year free parts replacement warranty, you can rest easy knowing your investment is protected.

The ergonomic design includes a retractable footrest, adjustable and detachable headrest, and adjustable lumbar support for a customized fit. Whether you're gaming or working in the office, this chair is designed to provide the utmost support and comfort. Easy to assemble with pre-assembled screws and 24/7 customer service support, the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is the perfect choice for anyone seeking a top-of-the-line, stylish, and comfortable seating solution. Elevate your gaming or work experience with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair today!

Assembly is a breeze with pre-assembled screws and included instructions. Our 24/7 customer service is dedicated to providing you with the best experience.
